body_html:
Hi vrv,
I have pulled the most recent version, and configure python with the local installation. However, the error is still there.
actually the lib link points to the site-package, which I assume will resolve numpy errors.

python_include -> /share/software/python/2.7.10/Python-2.7.10/release/include/python2.7
python_lib -> /share/software/python/2.7.10/Python-2.7.10/release/lib/python2.7/site-packages

I have created softlink to libpython2.7.so.1.0 under /share/software/python/2.7.10/Python-
2.7.10/release/lib/python2.7/site-packages, which doesn't help either...

thanks!

actually the lib link points to the site-package, which I assume will resolve numpy errors.
